name: Spooky Woods (Rectus)
description:
NOTE: Requires a SteamVR compatible Virtual Reality headset set up for roomscale experiences, as well as motion controllers.

You are out in the moonlit woods all alone with your bag of buns.

Made for the 2018 Awful Holiday Jam. The woods are made with photogrammetry using RealityCapture.

Third-party assets used:

Sounds from the Soniss GDC packs:
Soundopolis - Natures Fury_Wind_01
NoizBoy - Hong Kong Action Kit - Hit Kit #2

Unreal Engine 4 VR sample assets - Hands and teleport effects
